content: AI T320 ON!Track Bluetooth® smart tag Durable asset tag to track construction equipment location and demand via the Hilti ON!Track tool tracking system – optimize your inventory and save time managing it ### Categories: Home > Products > Software > Construction management software- - - ### FEATURES:Features Avoid buying more equipment which wont be used – these tracking tags detect daily activity, showing you which tools lie idle and which are needed most Simpler tool management – track the location of your tools/equipment and perform fast inventory checks using the ON!Track app and cloud-based software IP67 durability rating – advanced dust- and water-resistance with a variety of sturdy attachment options to better withstand tough jobsite conditions Get started easily – all you need is a smartphone with Bluetooth® connectivity, and your local Hilti team is available to assist with tagging all your equipment Applications Track all your construction equipment irrespective of brand or type Identify specific tools/equipment using smart tag accessories (adhesive tape, adapter with cable ties or metal wire) Digitize the overview of tool location, usage frequency, maintenance status, warranty validity, last user and other key information about your equipment using ON!Track Part of our fully integrated ON!Track equipment management solution (only available with an active subscription - features vary depending on your subscription bundle) Keeping your equipment’s location data up to date with our global BLE network (subscription dependent) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 1.3 x 0.9 x 0.2 in Barcode type: 2D barcode (Datamatrix ECC200) IP protection class: IP 67, IP 69 Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 1.3 x 0.9 x 0.2 in | Barcode type | 2D barcode (Datamatrix ECC200) | IP protection class | IP 67, IP 69 | Communication standard | Bluetooth 4.0 | Broadcasting frequency | 7 s | Frequency | 2.4 GHz | 1 | Operating time at 23°C | 4 years | Operating temperature range | -4 - 140 °F | Product Class | Premium | at 72°F / 22°C according to ASTM D2471 ### ITEMS- 2273202 - ON!Track smart tag AI T320 - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x AI T320 ON!Track smart tag
